subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: For the first time since his supposed farewell at the 2012 London Olympics, Michael Phelps was on top of the podium, cruising to victory in the 100-meter butterfly at the Charlotte Grand Prix.
snippet: For the first time since his supposed farewell at the 2012 London Olympics, Michael Phelps was on top of the podium, cruising to victory in the 100-meter butterfly at the Charlotte Grand Prix.
